game.name: Drop Command
game.shortDescription: Mech combat at a grand scale! The year is 2647. War rages 150 light years from Earth. Pilot Mechs, Tanks, Infantry and Aircraft in combined arms combat on many worlds across the star cluster. Play as a lone wolf, or rise in rank to command entire battalions throughout a procedural campaign.
